description:
Feel confident when you explore unfamiliar scenes. This high-security bag goes over your clothes or under a jacket and gives you storage space for travel essentials. The RFID-blocking fabric is made with regenerated nylon waste, using a unique process that allows the yarns to be recreated and woven again and again. The sash is slash-resistant, and the zippers are tamper-proof and locking, so you can relax and take in the sights.

  • Made of Econyl® regenerated nylon waste, such as fish nets
  • Perimter zip opens wide to revel 6 card slots, a passport pocket and organizer slots for tickets or cash
  • Large enough to store an iPhone 7 Plus and other large smartphone
  • External pocket holds quick-access items
  • Slash-resistant cross-body strap adjusts from 38-75cm
  • RFID-blocking pockets and material keep your identity safe
  • Zippers have security tabs to make them harder to sneak open. They're also fully lockable
name: Pacsafe Econyl Daysafe Anti-Theft Crossbody Bag - Unisex
